description:
This is a keystroke launcher for Windows and macOS.


New features:
- Added rpm build for Linux
- Added arm64 build on Linux
- Added drag & drop for search result items that support it
- Added keyboard shortcut for setting focus on search bar (Ctrl+L & Cmd+L)
- Added folder path validation in windows application search settings
- Added ability to export and import the settings (Thanks @MarcoSennHaag)
Improvements:
- Added missing translations (Thanks @MarcoSennHaag)
- Reordered tray icon menu items (Thanks @MarcoSennHaag)
Bug fixes:
- Fixed icon for .deb build on Linux (Thanks @IrishBruse)
